This is a review for alternative medicine in San Jose, CA: "This was our first Sound Bath and my husband and I arrived early to the session. We were the first to arrive and Sabrina was so nice and welcomed us. She provided us information, allowed us to pick a spot that was comfortable and also took our picture. Ten minutes into the session my husband was already snoring (so it definitely worked for him). I was so relaxed and calm after the session ended. It was a wonderful experience and we will definitely be back. Life can be stressful these days. Take time out for an hour and join Sabrina as she bathes you in the most beautiful tranquil sounds.
